name: The Backrooms
description:
A strange place between dimensions traps you.  Can you survive among endless halls of yellowed carpet and harshly humming fluorescents?

Replaces all normal worldgen: no wilderness, no rivers, no cities, no farms, no sky.  Just endless, winding indoor halls of mildewy carpeting, faded drywall, desolate breakrooms and abandoned boardrooms.

Recommended city size is 0.  Play Now!  (Default Scenario) is not supported.
